features: Sturdiness: king platform bed frame features a sturdy metal construction that ensures long-lasting durability and stability
Great Bed Headboard: The bed frame comes with storage shelves and Outlets that complement any room decor
Storage Capacity: The space under the bed and 2 drawers at the end of the bed can provide extra storage space without taking up extra space helping you keep your bedroom neat and organized
Easy to Assemble: Putting together this bed frame king is a breeze with the included instructions, tools, and easy-to-use wrenches and bolts.

Value for Money: Its neutral color and clean lines make it the perfect complement to any decor style. Whether you're looking to upgrade your bedroom or furnish a guest room, this bed frame is the perfect choice

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Enhance Your Sleeping Experience Sturdy and Stylish King Bed Frame and Headboard Looking for a bed frame that can provide a comfortable and stylish sleeping experience? Our likimio king bed frame is just what you need. Constructed with sturdy and durable materials, this bed frame ensures lasting comfort and support. The upholstered headboard adds an extra touch of sophistication and comfort, allowing you to relax and unwind after a long day. With easy assembly and simple maintenance, this bed frame is hassle-free and ready to use in no time.

Color Vintage Brown and Gray Material Metal Supports,MDF Headboard, Fabric King Bed Frame Dimension 86.6" * 78" * 41.3" Headboard Shelf Size 78*5.5*4.7" Drawer Dimension 37.8*15.8*5.5" Support Legs 9 Under-bed Storage 10.6 Weight Capacity 1000
Storage Headboard with Outlets 2 Storage Drawers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing bed for the price!
reviews.reviewText: I have had this bed for about a month now and I love it! Nice and sturdy and I love that the slats aren’t wood! Was easy to assemble and the usb ports are a nice bonus

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid, easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: I’m quite pleased with this bed. For the price, I wasn’t expecting much. First, I really like that the slats that support the mattress are metal and have secure spots they fit into. Past beds of mine have had cheap wood pieces that just lay there loosely and always end up breaking. The assembly was very easy. Took my partner and I less than an hour. The only negative thing I have to say is that the drawers just set on the floor and slide out but I don’t see that being a problem, I consider that a bonus. I did know that before buying and didn’t think I’d care and I don’t.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The drawers are dumb…
reviews.reviewText: The bed itself is nice. Easy enough to assemble and are nice looking, feel sturdy and look nice. The shelf and plug are nice features though I do wish there was somewhere for cords to go… but the drawers. The drawers kind of suck. They look fine at the end of the bed but look silly if you put them on the side instead. I get they are supposed to be at the end of the bed but that’s not how it worked out with the bedroom layout. And we always tend to kick them and you can’t really store much in them anyway. I really wanted storage so I was excited about them but now I kind of wish they weren’t there after all. Will need to find alternative storage solutions….

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing product at an amazing price!
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a new king bed frame. I went to retailer after retailer after retailer. And the bed frames were soooo expensive! I just could not get myself to order a frame that was that expensive. I went to look on amazon for a frame and I found this one. It was so easy to put together. It is super comfortable. I love the storage that it has at the foot of the bed. The shelf at the head of the bed is super convenient, especially the outlet up there! Couldn't be happier with my purchase for my new home!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected
reviews.reviewText: This bed frame is sturdy and well designed. The headboard is a little high, leaving a small gap between the bottom of the headboard and the mattress, but with a thick mattress, it would be fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality - Great product!
reviews.reviewText: Very sturdy and easy to assemble. Great product, especially for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Bed doesn’t fit
reviews.reviewText: Love the look of the frame and it was super quick to put together. You’ll definitely need 2 people to assemble since some of the parts are heavy. The frame states it holds 1000 pounds and so far there’s been no issues there. but my complaint is how my mattress fits on the frame. We have a king size mattress and the mattress doesn’t fit the whole frame. If we pull the mattress so there’s no gap at the end of the bed, there’s a gap by our heads and our pillows fall in the hole.The outlet at the top of the bed is super convenient and the drawers under the bed make nice storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: the product came almost a week earlier than expected! it was a little difficult to put together, it took 3 of us lol. definitely need an extra set of hands. came with everything i needed! the screws are a little janky but we managed. definitely worth the price you pay!!!
